metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15277 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
ReadGIFImage in coders/gif.c in ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 and GraphicsMagick1.3.26 leaves the palette uninitialized when processing a GIF file that hasneither a global nor local palette. If the affected product is used as alibrary loaded into a process that operates on interesting data, this datasometimes can be leaked via the uninitialized palette.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15277` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.26-14
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.26-14
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.26-14
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.26-14
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.26-14
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

imagemagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
imagemagick-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagick++-6.q16-8 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagick++-6.q16hdri-8 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagickcore-6.q16-6 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagickcore-6.q16-6-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-6 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-6-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagickwand-6.q16-6 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-6 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
perlmagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.26-14').
imagemagick package in esm-apps/focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu8').
